segments.text: Hello ! I'm Penny , I moved here just now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , Penny , I'm Leonard , glad to meet you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nice to meet you , too . I thought I should come and say hello to you . I haven't known anybody .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is hard to get used to a new place , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Would you like to come here later to have a coffee ? Bring all your family .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We'd like to . Can you tell me when we go ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Do you want us to bring something ?
segments.speaker: S2
